TextView.android:text: Install Windows 7/8 themes and icons in Ubuntu 13.10/13.04/12.10/12.04/Linux Mint 16/15/14/13 and other Ubuntu derivatives (GTK + Cinnamon) If you just moved from Windows or want to move from Windows to Linux and you like Windows interface, so here are themes + icons for your Linux desktop to make it like Windows.
